about_the_game:
PearFinch’s Cybernetic Battle BGM is a music package designed specifically for science-fiction RPG environments. Many songs are utilizable during enemy encounters or bosses due to their high-energy nature; however, additional songs have been included in this pack that are more atmospheric.

This special soundtrack package contains many unique features. Each song on the soundtrack is distinct, using different instruments and emotional changeups.

Strong synthetic square leads, flutes, piano, and breakbeat percussion characterizes the soundtrack with a serious and futuristic RPG atmosphere.

The melodies are very free-form and dynamic, leading to re-playable tracks that can excite and ignite!

*******************************************
●Audio: 23 Tracks

●Song Titles & Associated Lengths:
1. “The Truth Lies” – 13:14
2. “Master of Darkness” – 6:21
3. “All Systems Offline” – 1:20
4. “All Systems ONLINE” – 1:42
5. “Bullet Viscera” – 7:40
6. “Ion Ambience” – 1:07
7. “Hidden Factory” – 2:24
8. “Neolithic Entity” – 4:49
9. “Visual Cortex Black-hat” – 4:06
10. “Volt-Gauge” – 1:57
11. “Gold to Gold” – 3:04
12. “Diode Dreams” – 1:30
13. “Lightning Superweapon” – 3:58
14. “Data Manor” – 2:38
15. “Worldwide Web” – 2:10
16. “Emotions Banished” – 2:20
17. “Cathedral of the Machine” – 3:22
18. “Floating in Argon” – 2:10
19. “Syringe of Mercurial Fluid” – 3:56
20. “North” – 3:33
21. “Odd Situation” – 7:36
22. “Strange Soul” – 3:55
23. “Populate the Abyss” – 4:27
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
